function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interaction between susceptible subgroup and infectives with age-specific transmission potential","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions for susceptible subgroups and age-specific control measures","Technologies":"Age-specific vaccination campaigns, targeted public health awareness programs","People":"Particular susceptible subgroups, people of all ages","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Linear relationship between contact rates and visitor density","Impact":"Underestimation of face-to-face contacts in dense gatherings","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional data sources to account for face-to-face contacts, adjust contact rate calculations for dense gatherings","Technologies":"Mobile tracking data, social network analysis tools","People":"Urban residents, visitors to dense areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Spatial variations in the basic reproduction number (R0)","Impact":"Significant impact on spatiotemporal evolution of disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement targeted control measures in areas with high R0, adjust resource allocation based on spatial R0 variations","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, targeted surveillance systems","People":"Residents of areas with high R0, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
